div.all-attr: [textArea: '', display: 'What is the best way to display this data and how should the data be visualized? (i.e. plot chlorophyll on a color scale from blues to greens to yellows to reds or plot biomass with graduated circles in one color)', type: 'String']
div.label: What is the best way to display this data and how should the data be visualized? (i.e. plot chlorophyll on a color scale from blues to greens to yellows to reds or plot biomass with graduated circles in one color)

div.all-attr: [textArea: '', display: 'What are the ranges for the data to be plotted? (i.e. biomass 10-19, 20-29, 30-39 with larger circles for larger numbers or evenly spread chlorophyll values across color scale with 25 different colors on a blue-green-yellow-orange-red color scale)', type: 'String']
div.label: What are the ranges for the data to be plotted? (i.e. biomass 10-19, 20-29, 30-39 with larger circles for larger numbers or evenly spread chlorophyll values across color scale with 25 different colors on a blue-green-yellow-orange-red color scale)

div.all-attr: [textArea: '', display: 'Are there additional ways the data can be visualized? Please list them in order of preference.', type: 'String']
div.label: Are there additional ways the data can be visualized? Please list them in order of preference.
